heading: Ancient Reservoir Dungeon Guide
content: Ancient Reservoir does not have any dangerous monsters and features a linear layout that requires some minor backtracking. It is decent for farming, and is currently a possible . The Tomb Lord boss has an annoying spell that creates null zone areas where you cannot use abilities that are best avoided. This dungeon unlocks the , a solid offensive aspect for the Barbarian. While every dungeon has a somewhat randomized layout, there are patterns to where objectives and bosses are located. This map will help you identify those layouts so you can complete dungeons faster and maximize your XP and loot per hour! Reviewed by
